title: Relax, Lounge & Enjoy Our Rooftop Views!
posting_body: ['The Martin', '2051 3rd Street , San Francisco, CA, 94107', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 17', 'OR Text', '17', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'Use this link for more info:', '<URL>', 'Your Ideal Home Awaits at The Martin!', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 677 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Indulge in elegant living amongst the fine offerings and exceptional location of historic Dogpatch.', "At The Martin, you'll be immersed in the modern design you've been looking for.", 'Find yourself equally matched in either a studio, one-, two-, or three-bedroom home, and fall in love with where you live.', 'Each of our Dogpatch apartments in San Francisco offer open concept living washed in gorgeous natural light and fabulous downtown views.', 'Take advantage of the rooftop deck and well-equipped fitness center, and make your four-legged friend feel at home as we are proud to be pet friendly at The Martin!', "If you're looking for magnificent bay views, exciting nightlife, and five-star living, you should consider our impressive community, and uncover what true urban living in California is meant to look like.", '<URL>', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed, Rent $65.00, Deposit $500.00', 'Comments: Dogs & Cats Allowed', 'Income Requirements:', '3x', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Saturday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.', '5B1sZUW5']
